Class EcolawFactoryImpl

java.lang.Object
  it.apice.sapere.api.impl.EcolawFactoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
EcolawFactory
public class EcolawFactoryImpl
extends Object
implements EcolawFactory

This class provides an implementation of the EcolawFactory interface.

Author:
Paolo Contessi
